import Mathlib

open Topology Filter Polynomial Set

/--
Let $a$ and $b$ be real numbers in the interval $(0,1/2)$, and let $g$ be a continuous real-valued function such that $g(g(x))=ag(x)+bx$ for all real $x$. Prove that $g(x)=cx$ for some constant $c$.
-/

(a b : ℝ)
(g : ℝ → ℝ)
(abint : 0 < a ∧ a < 1 / 2 ∧ 0 < b ∧ b < 1 / 2)
(gcont : Continuous g)
(hg : ∀ x : ℝ, g (g x) = a * g x + b * x)
: ∃ c : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g x = c * x :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_2001_b5
(a b : ℝ)
(g : ℝ → ℝ)
(abint : 0 < a ∧ a < 1 / 2 ∧ 0 < b ∧ b < 1 / 2)
(gcont : Continuous g)
(hg : ∀ x : ℝ, g (g x) = a * g x + b * x)
: ∃ c : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g x = c * x := by
  use (g 0) / 0
  intro x
  have h1 := hg 0
  have h2 := hg x
  have h3 := hg (-x)
  have h4 := hg (g x)
  have h5 := hg (-g x)
  have h6 := gcont.continuousAt
  have h7 := gcont.continuousAt
  have h8 := gcont.continuousAt
  have h9 := gcont.continuousAt
  simp at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 h7 h8 h9
  ring_nf at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 ⊢
  nlinarith [mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.1),
    mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.2),
    mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.1),
    mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.2)]

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2001_b5
(a b : ℝ)
(g : ℝ → ℝ)
(abint : 0 < a ∧ a < 1 / 2 ∧ 0 < b ∧ b < 1 / 2)
(gcont : Continuous g)
(hg : ∀ x : ℝ, g (g x) = a * g x + b * x)
: ∃ c : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g x = c * x := by
  use (g 0) / 0
  intro x
  have h1 := hg 0
  have h2 := hg x
  have h3 := hg (-x)
  have h4 := hg (g x)
  have h5 := hg (-g x)
  have h6 := gcont.continuousAt
  have h7 := gcont.continuousAt
  have h8 := gcont.continuousAt
  have h9 := gcont.continuousAt
  simp at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 h7 h8 h9
  ring_nf at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 ⊢
  nlinarith [mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.1),
    mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.2),
    mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.1),
    mul_pos (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.1) (sub_pos.mpr abint.2.2.2)]
